name: BSO
comment:
>>37737777

> [[ 2 ]]

"No good, Nel! Get back, now!" There's a sudden shift in the ground, throwing your balance as you draw within proximity.

It's already here.

The earth in front of you cracks, and bends up into a mound before shattering. A blast of light. You're bombarded by sharp bits of rock from in front, and bring your arms up to shield your face. It hits you head on, mouth-parts clamping together around your ankle, and throws you skyward with a barreling, rag-doll swing.

You see blood. It hurtsâ€”not real pain, but that same dull feeling you got when you were last hit.

[[ Ascheritte: 13 / 24 HP ]]

It's below you, and much larger than the other three, about as big as a van, were you in real life. It's created a massive, angry barrier between Nel and Rhett, and Tatsumaki and Vision; the former two are still struggling with a pair of crawlers, while the latter two have defeated their targets and are scrambling to make some distance.

You're ten or fifteen feet in the air, tumbling, and are unsure of if you're falling yet or still ascending. The giant crawler is below you on the ground, turning towards Nel and Rhett. You don't know if there's fall damage.

> Other
